posts.post_content:
Was able to upgrade this card so available to trade is a tough T213-3 Chick Gandil. Card is a slight miscut where you can see the top of the card below Gandil on the back. 

Looking to trade for Black Sox items that I do not currently have, so shoot over anything that you may have! Would outright sell for $1300 delivered. PM or email at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url].
